original_title: 時空変態人間 もしも時間が止められたら！
overview: An erotic comedy starring popular sexy actress Urumi Narumi. Mitsuo, who was in his fourth year aiming for medical school, was working part-time as a cleaner at the hospital where Misora, a nurse he admired, worked. One day, Mitsuo is given glasses by Gotokuji, a hospitalized patient, that can stop time for 4 seconds.
title: Space-Time Pervert: If Time Could Stop!
